/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Traffic lights and street signs punctuate the scene, guiding the flow of vehicles and pedestrians. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the image. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and orderly.
